HomePage.title: Welcome to Huaypo Adventure
HomePage.subtitle: Discover the magic of the Andes

Hero.title: Explore Machu Picchu, Sacred Valley, Vinicunca, And The Best Of Peru
Hero.subtitle: Travel in small groups and enjoy personalized tours!

Intro.title: Travel with confidence throughout Peru in <highlight>small groups</highlight> with <highlight>Huaypo Adventure</highlight>
Intro.description: At Huaypo Adventure we believe that traveling goes beyond visiting places - it is feeling, learning and connecting. We are a passionate team from Cusco guiding you through authentic experiences: from the magical sunrise at Machu Picchu to the vibrant colors of Rainbow Mountain, to meeting Andean communities on our experiential tours. What sets us apart is how we do it - with heart, taking care of every detail so that your adventure is unique and meaningful. We know these paths as only locals can, and we want to share them with you just as we would welcome a friend to our land. Ready to experience the real Peru? We await you with open arms and the best routes to discover.

local.title: Local Company
local.description: 100% Peruvian offering you authentic experiences full of passion.

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.description: With the highest standards. Live a safe and unforgettable adventure in Cusco!

groups.title: Small Groups
groups.description: With a maximum of 12 people for a personalized and authentic experience.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Travel
sustainable.description: We respect the environment and support local communities.

impact.title: Positive Impact
impact.description: We support the development of Andean communities.

guides.title: Local Guides
guides.description: Who will show you the authentic magic of the Andes. Join us!

AboutPreview.subtitle: Who We Are
AboutPreview.title: Huaypo Adventure: We Are Explorers, For Explorers
AboutPreview.p1: At Huaypo Adventure, we turn your dreams of exploring Peru into unforgettable adventures. With a passion for creating extraordinary travel experiences, we specialize in crafting exclusive and personalized trips for small groups or private parties.
AboutPreview.p2: Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and ancient wonders of Peru, guided by our team of local experts dedicated to making your trip unique.

CustomTours.title: CUSTOM TAILOR-MADE TOURS & PACKAGES
CustomTours.p1: Imagine staying in a treehouse deep in the Amazon or feeding alpacas from your balcony jacuzzi with the Andes as a backdrop. At Huaypo Adventure, all our tours are completely customizable, so you can design your dream trip to Peru from scratch.
CustomTours.p2: From unique experiences off the tourist track to carefully selected accommodations, transfers, and flights, we take care of every detail. Contact us today to start planning your unique trip!

list.title: Beautiful views
list.text: Punctual and helpful, they made us feel safe always asking about our needs. We went to Moray on ATVs, visited the Maras Salt Mines as well as a stop in Chinchero.
list.author: Francielle Tanamati

list.title: Incredible experience
list.text: Beautiful experience, super friendly treatment, at all times they provided us with necessary information and doing paddleboarding in the lagoon was extraordinary, thanks to Carlos and Juvenal.
list.author: Kelia L

list.title: Unforgettable tour!
list.text: Our Huaypo Adventure experience was excellent. Our guide was Carlos and driver Fabricio. It was an incredible experience, full of care and professionalism.
list.author: Aline

list.title: The best experience
list.text: Carlos provided excellent service without hesitation, they attended to us very well and at all times not only do they guide you, they help you take the best photos for memories.
list.author: Adriana C

Hero.title: About Us
Hero.subtitle: Meet the team behind your next adventure

Intro.title: Your Travel Agency for Unforgettable Tours and Adventures in Cusco
Intro.description: At Huaypo Adventure, our purpose is simple: to transform your trip to Peru into a collection of authentic and memorable experiences. As your expert travel agency in Cusco, we are passionately dedicated to revealing the incomparable cultural richness and majestic natural beauty that this region offers.

guides.title: Our Local Guides Team
guides.desc: They are the heart of Huaypo Adventure. Expert professionals passionate about Peru's history and culture. They will not only show you the landscapes but also share the stories and traditions that make each destination unique.

drivers.title: Our Drivers Team
drivers.desc: Behind every successful adventure is the tireless effort of our transport team. With a smile and admirable disposition, they handle all logistics to make your trip safe, comfortable, and pleasant.

cooks.title: Our Local Cooks Team
cooks.desc: Gastronomy is essential. With skill and creativity, they prepare delicious and nutritious dishes using fresh local ingredients. Our cooks not only feed your body but give you a taste of the authentic flavor of our land.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: We are a tour operator offering unique and authentic experiences in Peru, meeting the highest standards of quality and social responsibility.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: By 2030, to be one of the most competitive and sustainable tourism companies in Cusco, providing quality and safe services to travelers worldwide.

honesty.title: Honesty
honesty.desc: We promote truth to build trust.

security.title: Security
security.desc: We guarantee our well-being and that of our clients.

respect.title: Respect
respect.desc: We value others, the environment, and our heritage.

Certifications.title: We are a fully authorized company
